title: mich
author: mich
content: I think my biggest fear is of spiders. I am very terrified of spiders because of their eight legs and eyes. Spiders also have fangs that allow them to spit out silk to create webs to trap different types of flying insects to kill them and eat them. Now spiders are also able to lay their eggs on the webs they create around cold, dark, and dusty spaces. For example, behind furniture, underneath your bed or set of stairs, closets, and sometimes inside cabinets. That is why it is very important that your constantly clean your house to ensure spiders donâ€™t invade or home. I do not kill spiders when they are inside my house despite how scared I am of them. What I recommend is to set some traps around your house, this way you can catch them safely and take them to a pet store or try to release them to the wild.So what about your biggest fears?

comments.author: devil-soul
comments.body: Spiders scare me too, but mostly i fear big dogs and their bites

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Quote from: devil-soul on May 18, 2023, 04:11:41 PMSpiders scare me too, but mostly i fear big dogs and their bitesTo this very day, I am still afraid of big dogs. I was attacked by Pitbull when I was only 6 years old. I was walking back home from school, and I saw that one of our neighborâ€™s dogs manage to get out of their front yard. I was so nervous and scared that I started running towards my house which still was like four houses down the street. By the time I was able to get to the third house, I was knocked down by the Pitbull who bit me on my ankle. I started kicking the Pitbull with my other foot to try to let me go. I screamed for help and felt like it was an eternity before my other neighbor came out from the house with a metal pipe and hit the Pitbull in the head to let me go. When my neighbor saw that the dog was not letting me go, he kicked the Pitbull with his steel-toe boot right underneath his mouth and it took off running. I have a scar on my ankle where the Pitbull bit me, ever since I have been traumatized and nervous to go near any big dogs.

What I recommend is to set some traps around your house, this way you can catch them safely and take them to a pet store or try to release them to the wild.So what about your biggest fears?waaah, of course spiders.. I dont kill them also. But only because I'm so scared of them  I trained my GF for this, she is doin it for me.. Thats a true love <3  When I see a spider, my heart can skip the bum bum you know...

comments.author: Dhrugtest
comments.body: My biggest fear is bedbug with snake they can disgrace you publicly ðŸ˜‚

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Quote from: Dhrugtest on May 26, 2023, 04:52:40 PMMy biggest fear is bedbug with snake they can disgrace you publicly ðŸ˜‚When I stay in hostels for when I travel this has been a problem before. Now I always check my bed sheets and pillow casing. I think this is gross to find bed bugs but it does not scare me like a spider or a dog.Those will attack you and cause you harm. Bed bugs is just really gross still can bite but just no that scary being so small.

comments.author: hungsuchumanh1
comments.body: I will often begin to worry and panic when I am about to undergo medical treatment and see a doctor, the most common of which is fear of getting vaccinated. When I am about to be injected, I will feel shaky, my heart will beat faster and I will probably pass out from panic.

comments.author: Kspaakash330
comments.body: Every one has fears.I also have fears too.But that is to lose my love ones infront of my eyes..

comments.author: Bananington
comments.body: There was a time when I feared making a public appearance more than anything. I would like to say shy, but I was really scared. I wouldn't mind avoiding any public role for fear of so much eyeballs starring. I also feared cows at a time, but I out grew all these when public hairs and bills multiplied. My current fear is being broke.it Scares the hell outta me when I start getting debits or calls from utility services I patronize or from the credit card companies I use. Don't wanna have those fears now, because it ain't even worth the time.
